comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content:
Lucy Bond Work married Peter Cooper Hewitt; she was the sister of Frances Ellen Work. Frances was the great-grandmother of the late Diana, Princess of Wales; Frances has also appeared in the Commons:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2163454306/]

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: See notes under: Mrs. P.C.Hewitt was on the Mayor's Committee responsible for the Bundle Day clothing giveaway. This is probably at the headquarters at 210 Fifth Avenue.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: From a genealogy page, www.bradleyfoundation.org/Maite/marcus/tobg302.htm : Lucy Bond Work was born in May 1860 in New York, NY, USA. She died on 21 Mar 1934 in New York, NY, USA. Lucy married Peter Cooper Hewitt son of Abram Stevens Hewitt and Sarah Amelia Cooper on 27 Apr 1887 in New York, NY, USA. The marriage ended in divorce.Peter was born on 5 May 1861 in New York, NY, USA. He died on 25 Aug 1921 in Paris, France.
